abstract: Justice Lawrence S Knipel of the New York State Supreme Court rules that development can continue on Pierhouse, Brooklyn hotel and condominium complex that will obscure some views of the Brooklyn Bridge.
lead_paragraph: Justice Lawrence S. Knipel of State Supreme Court ruled that developers were within their legal rights in blocking portions of the bridge from people viewing it along the Brooklyn Heights Promenade.

headline.main: Judge Clears Way for Pierhouse Complex to Cast Shadow on Brooklyn Bridge
headline.print_headline: Stalled Brooklyn Project Can Continue, Judge Says

snippet: Justice Lawrence S. Knipel of State Supreme Court ruled that developers were within their legal rights in blocking portions of the bridge from people viewing it along the Brooklyn Heights Promenade.
